Class UserIconDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper

  • public class UserIconDatabase
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Helper class for user icon database

      • addIconSet

        public long addIconSet(UserIconSet iconset)
        Add iconset to DB Does not process icons. They should be loaded individually via addIcon
        Parameters:
        iconset -
        Returns:
        row ID or -1 upon failure

      • getMostUsedIcon

        public UserIcon getMostUsedIcon(java.lang.String group)
        Select most used icon, optionally within a group Note, currently MapGroup hierarchy does not track iconsets So, its possible two different iconsets have provided icons in the same group Note, in DB iconset UID is tracked
        Parameters:
        group -
